strings.ITEM_MOREMISSILE_PICKUP: Gain a huge damage increase for your missile items and some** missile-related skills.
strings.ITEM_MOREMISSILE_DESC: Increases the TOTAL damage for all <style=cIsDamage>missile items</style> and some** <style=cIsDamage>missile skills</style> by <style=cIsDamage>3x</style> <style=cStack>(+1.5x per stack)</style>.
